name: Chicken Club Wrap
author: Anonymous
summary: This quick club can double as a filling lunch or a light snack. It just depends on how you slice it.
ingredients: 4 each Mission® Life Balance® Whole Wheat Tortillas
4 strips bacon fully cooked, microwave to crispy
1  avocado, peeled, pitted and sliced lengthwise
12 piece (blank)s slices oven-roasted deli-sliced chicken breast
directions: Spread 1 tablespoon of mayonnaise over each tortilla
To build 1 wrap: place lettuce on the center of the wrap
Top lettuce with tomato, onion, bacon, avocado and sliced chicken
Fold in the left and right sides of the wrap towards the center, and roll the bottom edge of the tortilla into a burrito shape
Slice the wrap in half and serve
